text: Margaret Louise "Margie" Hines (October 15, 1909 – December 23, 1985), also known as Marjorie Hines, was an American movie, stage, voice, and television actress. She was known for her voice role as Olive Oyl in Popeye and as Betty Boop. She was born in New York City, New York on October 15, 1909. She was married to Jack Mercer from 1939 until they divorced in 1950. Hines died on December 23, 1985 in Seaford, New York at the age of 76.Ancestry: Jesse William Heidtmann in the U.S., Social Security Applications and Claims Index, 1936–2007 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 births Category:1985 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Margie Hines
